General.Name: Azincourt Uranium Inc
General.Description: Azincourt Energy Corp., an exploration and development company, focuses on the alternative fuels/alternative energy sector in Canada and Peru. It explores for uranium and lithium deposits, as well as other clean energy elements. The company has an option to acquire a 70% interest in the East Preston project located in Saskatchewan. It also has an option agreement with ValOre Metals Corp. to acquire a 75% interest in the Hatchet Lake uranium project consisting of 6 mineral claims located in Saskatchewan, Canada. The company was formerly known as Azincourt Uranium Inc. and changed its name to Azincourt Energy Corp. in October 2017. Azincourt Energy Corp. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
